sentence.Network_en: They headed inland on a forlorn road that was rutted and pocked.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们沿着一条坑坑洼洼布满车辙印的荒凉小路向内地进发。

sentence.Network_en: Some of the walls were pocked with bullet holes.
sentence.Network_cn: 有几堵墙上留下了累累弹痕.

sentence.Network_en: Used in car audio, cassette tape recorders, pocked calculator circuits, etc.
sentence.Network_cn: 适用于汽车音响 、 盒式收录机 、 袖珍计算器等电路.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Used in locomotive communication , pocked intercom telephones , car audio circuits , etc., 适用于移动通讯 , 袖珍对讲机 , 汽车音响等电路.

entry.def: Pocked means the same as pockmarked .

means.word_mean: 1. used of paved surfaces having holes or pits
2. marked by or as if by smallpox or acne or other eruptive skin disease
